alert.note: Alert for Antrim; Benzie; Charlevoix; Emmet; Grand Traverse; Leelanau; Manistee; Wexford (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 7:07AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Leelanau, Benzie, northwestern Wexford, Grand Traverse, Manistee, western Antrim, southern Emmet and south central Charlevoix Counties through 800 AM EST... At 706 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Grand Traverse Light to 19 miles west of Ludington SP. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Frankfort, Empire, Sleeping Bear Point, Glen Arbor, Elberta and Glen Haven around 710 AM EST. Leland, Arcadia, Platte Township and Burdickville around 720 AM EST. Beulah, Grand Traverse Light, Northport, Benzonia and Leelanau State Park around 725 AM EST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Honor, Lake Leelanau, Maple City, Pierport, Manistee, Suttons Bay, Cedar, Onekama, Wildwood, Omena, Parkdale, Orchard Beach State Park, Norwood, Eastlake, Bear Lake, Lake Ann, Peshawbestown, Fishermans Island State Park, Charlevoix, Bingham, Norwalk, Fouch, Thompsonville, Bendon and Greilickville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Antrim; Benzie; Charlevoix; Emmet; Grand Traverse; Leelanau; Manistee; Wexford
